awd_titl_txt: Engineering Research Equipment Grant:  LDV Measurements of  Water Wave-Structure Interaction
awd_abstract_narration: This Engineering Research Equipment Grant is for the aquisition                 of a                                                                            Laser Doppler Velocimeter for use in a study of the kinamatics of                                                                                               Wave-Structure interactions.  Fluid velocities very close to the                solid                                                                           boundary will be measured with this instrumentation in the run-up               of                                                                              long waves up a sloping beach, and motion incident on a moving                  surface                                                                         such as a floating breakwater or a floating platform.                                                                                                           Quality laboratory data is urgently needed in these areas both                  for its                                                                         own sake as well as in establishing a basis for computer model                  verification.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
